remarks: The addition operation of the multivariate power series structure. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Dec-2014.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Oct-2015.)
statement:
psrplusg.s $e |- S = ( I mPwSer R ) $.
psrplusg.b $e |- B = ( Base ` S ) $.
psrplusg.a $e |- .+ = ( +g ` R ) $.
psrplusg.p $e |- .+b = ( +g ` S ) $.
psrplusg $p |- .+b = ( oF .+ |` ( B X. B ) ) $.
